meanings.definition: A Greek dish made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce.
meanings.sent1: I tried moussakas for the first time at the Greek restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom's moussakas recipe is a family favorite.
meanings.sent3: The moussakas was so delicious that I almost licked the plate clean.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of moussakas filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust on top of the moussakas was perfectly crispy.

meanings.definition: A similar dish made with other vegetables or ingredients, such as zucchini or potatoes.
meanings.sent1: The vegetarian moussakas at the cafe was surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent2: I prefer moussakas with zucchini instead of eggplant.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to make moussakas with potatoes, but it didn't turn out well.
meanings.sent4: The chef's creative twist on moussakas with different vegetables was a hit.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bubbling moussakas filled the room with warmth.
